snippet: The company, which also makes Jif peanut butter and Crisco oils, forecast full-year adjusted earnings of $5.95 to $6.05 a share.
abstract: JM Smucker raises its full-year profit estimates amid increased sales, forecasting adjusted earnings of $5.95 to $6.05 a share; adjustment implies revenue of about $5.9 billion.
lead_paragraph: The company, which also makes Jif peanut butter and Crisco oils, forecast full-year adjusted earnings of $5.95 to $6.05 a share.

headline.main: Smucker Forecasts Profit Above Analysts’ Expectations
headline.print_headline: Smucker Forecasts Profit Above Analysts’ Expectations
